member.name: T:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData
member.summary: Represents a trackable item.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.#ctor(Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.SchrodingersString,Randomizer.SMZ3.ItemType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified item name and type.
member.param: The possible names of the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Name
member.summary: Gets the possible names for the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Article
member.summary: Gets the grammatical article for the item (e.g. "a" or "the").

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Plural
member.summary: Gets the possible plural names for the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.NameWithArticle
member.summary: Gets the name of the article, prefixed with "a", "the" or none, depending on the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.InternalItemType
member.summary: Gets the internal of the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Multiple
member.summary: Indicates whether the item can be tracked more than once.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Stages
member.summary: Gets the stages and their names of a progressive item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Column
member.summary: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the column in which the item should be displayed on the tracker.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Row
member.summary: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the column in which the item should be displayed on the tracker.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Image
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the image to be displayed on the tracker.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.MaxStage
member.summary: Gets the highest stage the item supports, or 0 if the item does not have stages.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.HasStages
member.summary: Indicates whether the item has stages.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.TrackingState
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracking state of the item.
member.remarks: For example, 0 represents an untracked item, 1 represents an obtained item and higher values indicate items that have been obtained more than once.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.GetStage(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the stage of the item with the specifies name.
member.returns: The number of the stage with the given name, or null if the name does not match a stage.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Track
member.summary: Tracks the item.
member.returns: if the item was tracked; otherwise, .
member.remarks: Tracking may fail if the item is already tracked, or if the item is already at the highest stage.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Untrack
member.summary: Untracks the item or decreases the item by one step.
member.returns: if the item was removed; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Track(System.Int32)
member.summary: Marks the item at the specified stage.
member.param: The stage to set the item to.
member.returns: if the item was tracked; otherwise, .
member.remarks: Tracking may fail if the item is already at a higher stage.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.Is(Randomizer.SMZ3.ItemType)
member.summary: Determines whether the item is of the specified type.
member.param: The type of item to check against.
member.returns: true if matches this item's type; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: If this item's type is Nothing, the item is considered the same if it is a scam item.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemData.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representing the item.
member.returns: A string representing the item.

member.name: T:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemTrackedEventArgs
member.summary: Contains event data for item tracking events.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the item that was tracked.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ItemTrackedEventArgs.TrackedAs
member.summary: Gets the name of the item as it was tracked.

member.summary: Provides data for events that occur when clearing a location.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.LocationClearedEventArgs.Location
member.summary: Gets the location that was cleared.

member.summary: Specifies the types of medallions used to open dungeons.

member.summary: No medallion is required.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Medallion.Bombos
member.summary: Bombos is required.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Medallion.Ether
member.summary: Ether is required.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Medallion.Quake
member.summary: Quake is required.

member.summary: Provides functionality for the enumeration.

member.summary: Converts the medallion to the equivalent .
member.returns: The that is the equivalent of .

member.name: T:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Peg
member.summary: Represents a peg in Peg World mode.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Peg.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The zero-based index of the column.
The zero-based index of the row.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Peg.Column
member.summary: Gets the zero-based index of the column in which the peg is shown.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Peg.Row
member.summary: Gets the zero-based index of the row in which the peg is shown.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Peg.Pegged
member.summary: Indicates whether the peg has been pegged.

member.name: T:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig
member.summary: Represents the various phrases that Tracker can respond with.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.StartedTracking
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker starts.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.StoppedTracking
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker stops.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.Misheard
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when speech recognition confidence does not meet the configured threshold for execution.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a simple single-stage item.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedItemByStage
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a progressive item using a specific stage name.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the base item name (e.g. Sword), {1} is a placeholder for the current stage of the progressive item (e.g. Master Sword).

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedItemMultiple
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item that can be tracked multiple times.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the plural item name. {1} is a placeholder for the number of copies.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedProgressiveItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a progressive item.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the base item name (e.g. Sword), {1} is a placeholder for the current stage of the progressive item (e.g. Master Sword).

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedOlderProgressiveItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a lower tier of an item than you already have, e.g. tracking Master Sword when you have the Tempered Sword.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the base item name (e.g. Sword), {1} is a placeholder for the current stage of the progressive item (e.g. Master Sword).

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedTooManyOfAnItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item that is already at the max tier.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedAlreadyTrackedItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a single-stage item that is already tracked.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedMultipleItems
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking multiple items in an area at once.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.ClearedMultipleItems
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing multiple items in an area at once.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedNothing
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking or clearing multiple items in an area at once, but there no items available.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.TrackedSpecificItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a specific item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.UntrackedItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.UntrackedNothing
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item that hasn't been tracked yet.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.UntrackedProgressiveItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item that has multiple stages.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.UntrackedItemMultiple
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item that can be tracked multiple times.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.UntrackedItemMultipleLast
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking the last copy of an item that can be tracked multiple times.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.ShaktoolAvailable
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when Shaktool becomes available.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.PegWorldAvailable
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when Peg World becomes available.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.PegWorldModeOn
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when Peg World mode is toggled on.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.PegWorldModePegged
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when pegging a Peg World peg.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.PegWorldModeDone
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when all Peg World pegs have been pegged.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonRewardMarked
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the reward at a dungeon.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the reward that was marked.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonCleared
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing a dungeon.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon that was cleared. {1} is a placeholder for the boss of the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonClearedTreasuresCleared
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing treasures after clearing a dungeon.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the amount of items that were tracked.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonRequirementMarked
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the medallion requirement of a dungeon.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the medallion. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonRequirementInvalid
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the wrong dungeon with a required medallion.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonRequirementMismatch
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking a dungeon with a requirement that doesn't match the seed logic.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the medallion in the seed. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. {2} is a placeholder for the name of the medallion that was tracked.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.DungeonTreasureTracked
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking treasure in a dungeon. The dictionary key represents the amount of items left, where 2 is 2 or more and -1 is when the dungeon is already empty.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. {1} is the amount of items left after tracking.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.ItemTrackedInIncorrectDungeon
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item in a specific dungeon, but that dungeon does not have that item in the seed.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.LocationMarked
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking an item at a location.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.LocationMarkedAgain
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking an item at a location that has already been marked.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {2} is a placeholder for the name of the item that was previously marked here.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.LocationHasDifferentItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when marking or tracking an item at a location, when the seed contains a different item at the same location.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the item that was tracked or marked. {1} is a placeholder for the item that was in the same location in the seed.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.LocationCleared
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing a location.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. {1} is a placeholder for the item that was at the location.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.GoModeToggledOff
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when undoing Go Mode.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.AreaDoesNotHaveItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when attempting to track or clear an item in an area that does not have that item.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. {2} is a placeholder for the name of the item, including "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.AreaHasMoreThanOneItem
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when attempting to track or clear an item in an area that has multiple copies of that item.
member.remarks: {0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. {1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. {2} is a placeholder for the name of the item, including "a"/"the".

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.Error
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when an internal error occurs.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.ActionUndone
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with before undoing the last action.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.NothingToUndo
member.summary: Gets the phrases to respond with when there is nothing to undo.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ResponseConfig.Idle
member.summary: Gets a dictionary that contains the phrases to respond with when no voice commands have been issued after a certain period of time, as expressed in the dictionary keys.

member.name: T:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.RewardItem
member.summary: Specifies the type of pendant or crystal that is rewarded when completing a dungeon.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.RewardItem.Unknown
member.summary: Specifies the reward is unknown.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.RewardItem.Crystal
member.summary: Specifies the reward is a blue or red crystal.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.RewardItem.GreenPendant
member.summary: Specifies the reward is the green pendant.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.RewardItem.RedPendant
member.summary: Specifies the reward is the red pendant.

member.name: F:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.RewardItem.BluePendant
member.summary: Specifies the reward is the blue pendant.

member.summary: Provides functionality for the enumeration.

member.summary: Returns the possible names for the reward item.
member.returns: A new that represents the possible names.

member.summary: Represents multiple possibilities of a string.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified items.

member.summary: Returns a random string from the specified possibilities.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified text is among the possibilities for this string.
member.param: The type of comparison method to use.
member.returns: if is among the possibilities, otherwise, .

member.summary: Picks a phrase at random, taking into account any weights associated with the phrases.
member.param: The random number generator to use.
member.returns: A random phrase from the phrase set, or null if the phrase set contains no items.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Used to provide the tracking configuration.
Used to get the world to track in.
Used to provide the tracking speech recognition syntax.

member.param: A stream containing the saved state.
member.exception: is not a valid Tracker saved state.

member.summary: Saves the tracker state.
member.param: The stream to save the state to.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Tracker.FindItemByName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the item that has the specified name.
member.param: The name of the item to find.
member.returns: The with the specified name, or null if no items have a matching name.
member.remarks: Names are case insensitive, and items can be found either by their default name, additional names, or stage names.

member.name: M:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.Tracker.GetProgression(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the currently available items.
member.param: Indicates whether to add small and big dungeon keys to the progression pool. If keysanity is enabled for the current , this setting also adds keycards, which are otherwise always added.
member.returns: A new object representing the currently available items.

true to attempt to clear a location for the tracked item; false if that is done by the caller.

member.summary: Clears every item in the specified area, optionally tracking the cleared items.
member.param: The area whose items to clear.
true to track any items found; false to only clear the affected locations.
true to include every item in , even those that are not in logic. false to only include chests available with current items.

member.summary: Represents a dungeon in A Link to the Past.

member.summary: Gets the possible names of the dungeon.

member.summary: Gets the dungeon name abbreviation.

member.summary: Gets the possible names of the dungeon boss.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ZeldaDungeon.Column
member.summary: Gets or sets the zero-based of the column in which the tracker should display the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ZeldaDungeon.Row
member.summary: Gets or sets the zero-based of the row in which the tracker should display the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ZeldaDungeon.Reward
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of pendant or crystal you are rewarded with when you beat the dungeon boss.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ZeldaDungeon.Requirement
member.summary: Gets or sets the medallion that is required to enter the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ZeldaDungeon.TreasureRemaining
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of treasure items (excluding keys, compasses and maps) that remain in the dungeon.

member.name: P:Randomizer.SMZ3.Tracking.ZeldaDungeon.Cleared
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dungeon has been cleared.

member.summary: Returns a string representation of the dungeon.
member.returns: A string representing the dungeon.

member.returns: The in that matches this dungeon.
